testimonials.headline: Real St. Augustine Moving Stories
testimonials.subheadline: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what your neighbors in St. Augustine are saying about their experience with T&E Movers.

reviews.testimonialText: Moving out of our historic home in Lincolnville was emotional, but the T&E team was amazing. They were so careful with the old woodwork and handled our antiques like they were museum pieces. Truly exceptional service.

We moved from Jax down to St. Augustine Beach and T&E made it a breeze. They were on time, super efficient, and the final price was exactly what they quoted. The crew was friendly and professional. Highly recommend!

I was moving apartments downtown and worried about the tight spaces and parking. T&E knew exactly what to do. They had the truck parked and were moving my stuff before I even finished my coffee. Fast, professional, and zero stress.

faq.headline: St. Augustine Moving Questions, Answered
faq.subheadline: We've been St. Augustine's local moving experts for over 25 years. Here are answers to common questions about moving in the nation's oldest city.

items.question: How much does a local move in St. Augustine cost?
items.answer: Our local moves start at just $397. The final cost depends on factors like the size of your home, access for our trucks (especially downtown), and any extra services. We provide transparent, price-lock guarantees.

items.question: Can you handle moves in the historic downtown area?
items.answer: Absolutely. We are experts at navigating the narrow streets and historic properties of downtown St. Augustine. We use smaller trucks and specialized equipment to ensure a safe and efficient move.

items.question: How far in advance should I book my St. Augustine move?
items.answer: We recommend booking 3-4 weeks in advance, especially during the spring and fall. St. Augustine is a popular destination, and our schedule fills up quickly.

items.question: What areas do you serve around St. Augustine?
items.answer: We serve all of St. Johns County, including St. Augustine, St. Augustine Beach, Vilano Beach, Crescent Beach, and moves to and from Jacksonville, Ponte Vedra, and Nocatee.

items.question: How do you protect antique furniture?
items.answer: Our crews are specially trained in handling antiques. We use premium padding, custom crating for fragile items, and specialized techniques to ensure your valuable pieces are transported safely.

items.question: Do you offer packing services?
items.answer: Yes, we offer full and partial packing services. We can pack your entire home or just the fragile items, like glassware and artwork, to ensure they are protected during the move.

movingTips.headline: Top Tips for a Smooth St. Augustine Move
movingTips.subheadline: After 15,000+ local moves in St. Johns County, we know what makes for a seamless relocation. Here are our top insider tips.

tips.title: Plan for Historic Areas
tips.description: If you're moving in downtown St. Augustine, discuss access with us beforehand. We'll plan the best route and time to avoid traffic and narrow streets.

tips.title: Hire True Local Movers
tips.description: Choose a licensed and insured moving company that knows St. Augustine. We understand the unique challenges and beauty of moving in this historic city.

tips.title: Declutter Before Packing
tips.description: Get rid of unwanted items to reduce your load and save money. St. Johns County has many great donation centers.

tips.title: Label for Your New Home
tips.description: Label boxes by room and contents. This makes unpacking at your new St. Augustine home much faster and helps our crew place items correctly.

tips.title: Use Quality Materials
tips.description: Florida's humidity can weaken cheap boxes. We provide professional packing services and premium materials to protect your belongings.

tips.title: Protect Your Valuables
tips.description: Keep important documents, jewelry, and irreplaceable items with you during the move. Don't pack them in the moving truck.

tips.title: Schedule Utilities Early
tips.description: Arrange for utilities in St. Augustine to be transferred or started before moving day. You'll want that AC running!

tips.title: Pack an Essentials Kit
tips.description: Pack a 'first night' box with snacks, toiletries, chargers, and a change of clothes that travels with you, not on the truck.

tips.title: Communicate With Us
tips.description: Let your T&E moving coordinator know about specialty items, access issues, or time restrictions. Clear communication is key!

tips.title: Relax & Enjoy History
tips.description: You're moving to a beautiful, historic city! Let our experienced team handle the heavy lifting so you can start exploring.

cta.headline: Ready for a Stress-Free St. Augustine Move?
cta.subheadline: Let our experienced team handle everything while you focus on the excitement of your new home. Get your free quote today!
